item.title: Reconstructing historical trading PnL: A data pipeline approach
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Executive summary Recovering historical trading profit and loss (PnL) data is a critical challenge for finance and cryptocurrency platforms. When historical records are unavailable, users cannot validate past trading strategies, assess long-term performance, or reconcile discrepancies.
